function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ineffectiveness of digital systems for screening vital signs and self-reporting of symptoms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and surveillance concerns with aggressive contact tracing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ai predictive models trained on chinese samples may not be generalizable to other populations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Noise from social media and online traffic may lead to overfitted ai models and inaccurate trend predictions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate screening and testing strategies in some countries may result in underreporting of covid-19 cases and transmission rates.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of big data and ai for tracking people and infection spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of mobile phones and social media for real-time data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Real-time data reporting and sharing within healthcare organizations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High transmissibility of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Varied success in managing the burden of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective pandemic management despite preparedness","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater treatment plant wwtp inflow","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unspecific signal in rt-qpcr testing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor removal of sars-cov-2 in conventional activated-sludge wwtp","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete reduction of viral load in wastewater treatment systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detection of gene fragments in effluents","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unlikely infectivity and replication-competence of released viral particles","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large emission of sars-cov-2 gene equivalents into receiving water bodies from wastewater treatment plants wwtps .","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variability in viral shedding from infected persons and uncertainty in viral gene copies detected in human excreta.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variations in virus rna recovery affecting correlations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimated prevalence data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in wastewater composition affecting bioindicator utilization","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detection limit of the method not optimized for lower incidence levels","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in catchment area sizes and wastewater flow","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between measured sars-cov-2 load and estimated covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Optimization of pcr conditions may result in false-positive results.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accumulation of extraneous nucleic acids during the concentration process of wastewater samples.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Untested retention of wastewater samples before the sars-cov-2 pandemic as control.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible cross contamination during the purification or rna isolation step","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unspecific signal in rt-qpcr due to environmental contaminants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential false-positive results due to environmental contaminants affecting pcr","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of pcr targeting sars-cov-2 rdrp and m-gene in wastewater analysis.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Viral outgrowth assay using caco-2 cells for detecting sars-cov-2 infection in wastewater samples.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Comparison of rt-qpcr primer and probe efficiency for detecting sars-cov-2 genes in wastewater.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Analysis of bioindicators in wastewater to estimate population can lead to inaccurate assessments and decision-making.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Testing sample materials during a pandemic carries the risk of incomplete or inaccurate detection of contagious viruses such as sars-cov-2.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on pcr assays targeting specific genes for sars-cov-2 detection in wastewater may result in limited virus detection and surveillance.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher gene equivalent concentrations in the effluent than the influent due to repartitioning of gene material during wastewater treatment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Viral rna is not eliminated in the treated wastewater, indicating potential presence of contagious viruses.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to detect infectious sars-cov-2 particles in the treated sewage despite the presence of viral rna fragments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Positive identification of human sars-cov-2 by means of rt-qpcr","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher sars-cov-2 rna copy number in solid-phase reservoir of wastewater samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2-specific rna in untreated and treated wastewater samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variability in pcr measurements and storage conditions for rna extraction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disturbing factors accumulated during sample processing that could influence analysis results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Estimation of covid-19 cases based on sewer network connections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The use of filtration equipment may not effectively remove all contaminants, including contagious disease particles.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate quantification of endogenous parameters like creatinine and urea could lead to incorrect assessments of water quality and potential health risks.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The prevalence of reported covid-19 cases in the wwtp catchment area may indicate a higher risk of potential contamination in the water supply.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to wastewater samples during analysis","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
